name: The Bride
description:
The Bride

(Attention: I didn't have time to finish the invitations mechanic. The game is playable, but lacks some feedback about this matter. A church should be instead of the yellow-door house and you can only enter when you have delivered the 5 invitations, one per mailbox in the game.)

Monique had a crazy bridal shower and she is late to HER OWN WEDDING!

Help her send all the invitations and collect roses to improve the decoration.

Just move with the ARROW keys and use SPACEBAR to jump.

How do you win?

  • Don't get dirty by falling into the water.
  • Send ALL the invitations in the specified time.
  • Collect as many flowers as you can.

Have fun!
